title: Fallout 4 Review (SPOILER FREE) - Kinda Funny Reacts
description:
The day is finally here: Fallout 4 is upon us, and Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, and Kristine Steimer can tell you what they think of it! NO SPOILERS!

Subscribe! https://www.youtube.com/user/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Check out all our Fallout 4 content!
- Our Review: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NtT6YdVHLM4
- Greg's Let's Play: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XyxrPskQH7M
- Colin's Let's Play: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TAa7FLZctt0

This video was edited on an ORIGIN PC EVO15-S Laptop. Get your PC here: http://www.ORIGINPC.com

Follow us!
Kristine - http://www.twitter.com/Steimer
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation

Watch Kristine at - http://www.youtube.com/steimer

Music by Rakohus!: http://www.youtube.com/user/rakohus
